Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillborough Way, between the Fellowship Hall and the Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Fairy Dust Inn is located on the north side of the road and the large Fellowship Hall is located on the southern side of the road. To the east, you can see the intersection with Rosecrest Street. Hillborough runs east and west through the center of town, between a number of small shops and facilities.
